titles.title: A bill to clarify the treatment of certain property under the amendments made by the Tax Reform Act of 1986.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Provisions of Measure Incorporated Into H.R.4333.

bill.summary: 1/27/1988--Introduced. Amends the Tax Reform Act of 1986 to revise transitional rules applicable to specified downtown redevelopment property in Kenosha, Wisconsin, in connection with such Act's modifications of law governing: (1) the accelerated cost recovery system (depreciation); and (2) tax-exempt bonds.
